channel.title: Adding food

item.title: Adding food
item.dc:creator: @Unit666 Unit666
item.description:
@Unit666 wrote:

so all im trying to do is add new types of food to cook. but it seems impossible to me.
i used this guys tutorial on how to add a cooking base

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

so i tried, could you guys helps me out.
im using delta base(317)
im trying to add the cook crab meat

in cooking.java

public static int[][] CookingArray = { {1, 30, 40, 45, 80, 10, 1}, // Cooking Level Needed {317, 359, 377, 371, 383, 7518, 2138}, // Raw Food Id {315, 361, 379, 373, 385, 7521, 2142}, // Cooked Food Id {323, 367, 381, 375, 387, 7520, 2144}, // Burnt Food Id {30, 100, 120, 140, 210, 230, 30}, // Experience * ExpRate {15, 65, 68, 86, 100, 100, 15}, // Noburn Level (Without Cooking Gauntlets) {15, 65, 74, 86, 94, 100, 15}, // Noburn Level (With Cooking Gauntlets) };

and in client.java

if (UsedOnObjectID == 12269 && ItemID == 7518) { faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY); Cooking.Cooking(playerId, 5); }

Read full topic
